source_comments: I hope its not another powerpoint presentation like tbate

Infusioncenter

I will never applaud devs for letting players make stuff that should have been in the game in the first place. 

Like its cool that they let them, it would have been cooler had they done a better job at their Job so players dont have to do it for them.

First of all i will always point out when Players and modders do a better Job then developers do. Giving players the budget version of the tools you use and have them to better work then you is not something to be applaudet for. Otherwhise bethesda would be the best studio in the world. My mindset is always if i need to mod a game for it to be good, then there is something inherently wrong with the game that the devs should have done better to begin with.

Second even within the frames of the things they do Sabre has already done a poor job. The Salamander beeing on the Sniper Class, the laughable amounts of Cosmetic rewards earnable through the ingame achievements and thats just the cosmetic part without talking about all the other stuff that hasnt been so great.

And third i do have a PC i just prever getting high quality from the devs itself and not having to bother with mods.

The show is Black Butler. As for the eye, its a symbol marked by a Devil he has a contract with. The more obvious the placement of the Mark the more powerfull the Devil becomes in return and so ciel sacrificed his eye to make his servant as powerfull as he could.

Bro thinks gorillas in Zoos and shelters represent the average behaivor of gorillas in the wild i litteraly cant explain how wrong the statement of gorillas not knowing how to fight is.

These animals playfight from the moment they can walk and later on in life to defend their terretory against other gorillas or predators.

But lets assume the "dumb animal" is just swinging its arms around. A single hit from those and your bones are broken. A punch from a Human(speaking of the average human here btw not fucking eddie haul. The double world champion of strongest man alive is not a standart that should be applied here) does not do any meaningfull damage to a gorilla. It would be like a toddler punching an adult.

People think every human is some world champion special forces super soldier trained and coordinated in killing while the reality is most people out there dont know how to throw a punch properly. The gorilla also doesnt need to kill you an animal will fight to the death while most humans would shit themself like children when they see a bone sticking out of her arm or leg.
